awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 2 nominations.

fullplot: Gilbert Ivy and his wife Jewell are farmers. They seem to be working against the odds, producing no financial surplus. Gilbert has lost hope of ever becoming prosperous, but his wife decides to fight for her family.
